definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Eskimo/also called Inuit 因紐特|因纽特

sentences.english: I'm not sassing you in Eskimo talk.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有用愛斯基摩口吻頂撞你。

sentences.english: Eskimoes form igloos out of blocks of ice.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯基摩人用冰塊砌圓頂冰舍。

sentences.english: The Inuits are used to living on ice.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯基摩人對冰上的生活習慣了。

sentences.english: Eskimos use seal to make tough threads.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯基摩人用海豹皮做堅韌的線。
愛斯基摩人住在冰屋裏。

sentences.english: The Eskimos cut the ice into blocks.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯基摩人將冰切成大塊。

sentences.english: One pair of Eskimos of the brothers , their love life, love adventure.
sentences.chinese: 一對愛斯基摩人的兄弟，他們熱愛生活，熱愛探險。

sentences.english: It is this jargon that is usually referred to by traveler as the Eskimo langage .
sentences.chinese: 也就是這種行話常常被旅行的人當作了愛斯基摩語。

sentences.english: The Inuits are used to cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯基摩人對冷天氣習慣了。

sentences.english: Eskimos of the eastern arctic have a system of syllabic writing.
sentences.chinese: 北極東部的愛斯基摩人有一套音節書寫系統。

sentences.english: Or they can take a husky drawn sled ride through the snow.
sentences.chinese: 或可乘坐愛斯基摩犬拉的雪橇遊覽羣山。

sentences.english: One day Ugly shared his love with the neighbors huskies.
sentences.chinese: 一天，醜小咪想與鄰居的愛斯基摩犬分享愛。

sentences.english: Eskimos kill the animal for its meat and skin.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯基摩人爲了得到動物肉和皮而獵殺它們。

sentences.english: Eskimos feed on meat and fish.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯基摩人以喫肉和魚爲生。
